text:
The Birdaro training this week was on Collaborations. In my reflection I focus on how we might facilitate connection among stakeholders in a project some of us are planning that will involve mentees working on larger projects advised by R core developers (hope to be able to share more about this project soon, currently at the planning stage): <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1iTa3J6L1A9hHIDJA3phC5dtbxPAMHcXFEbwHRY2aQvk/edit?usp=sharing>.

I'll be submitting the reflection on behalf of our team by Wednesday afternoon (UTC) next week.
